description: Try our easy to follow White Chocolate-Dipped Strawberries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chocolate-covered fruit,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Strawberry,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Chocolate
name: White Chocolate-Dipped Strawberries Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Wash strawberries before drying them with a paper towel. Ensure they are dry.
Break white chocolate into pieces and place into a heatproof bowl.
Sit the bowl over a saucepan of simmering water but without touching the bottom of the bowl. Stir until melted and smooth.
Line a plate or tray with baking paper. Dip strawberries into chocolate until coated and place onto baking paper to set.
